metadata.title: CVE-2024-0760 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A malicious client can send many DNS messages over TCP, potentially causingthe server to become unstable while the attack is in progress. The servermay recover after the attack ceases. Use of ACLs will not mitigate theattack.This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.18.1 through 9.18.27, 9.19.0 through9.19.24, and 9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.27-S1.

criterions.comment: isc-dhcp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
